tool_description: Providing Weather Data in the best way possible!
name: Athena Weather
title: Athena Weather

api_list.name: get weather
api_list.description: gets weather of a specific location
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://athena-weather.p.rapidapi.com/v1/weather/NewYorkCity/C"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "athena-weather.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://athena-weather.p.rapidapi.com/v1/weather/{location}/{degree}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "athena-weather.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
